To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private TrueStrengthIndex _tsi;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_tsi = TSI(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_tsi.IsReady)
{
    var signal = _tsi.Signal.Current.Value;
    var current = _tsi.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.tsi = self.TSI(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.tsi.IsReady:
    signal = self.tsi.Signal.Current.Value
    current = self.tsi.Current.Value
